products.title: Style Customizer
products.name: Everest Forms Style Customizer
products.excerpt: Allows you to make design changes without coding. Powerful customizing panel with live preview helps you customize colors, fonts, spacing, background, alignment and more.

products.title: MailChimp
products.name: Everest Forms MailChimp
products.excerpt: Allows your users to subscribe to MailChimp through form submissions. Users filling up the forms can be directly added to your subscribers list in MailChimp.

products.title: ConvertKit
products.name: Everest Forms ConvertKit
products.excerpt: Allows you to efficiently grow your business by generating more leads with ConvertKit. It also helps increase automated emails for better lead generation.

products.title: PDF Form Submission
products.name: Everest Forms PDF Submission
products.excerpt: Allows you to generate digital PDF documents of any form submission to export them. It also lets you to send a PDF copy of the form submission via email attachment.

products.title: PayPal Standard
products.name: Everest Forms PayPal Standard
products.excerpt: Allows you to integrate online payment service to your e-commerce website. You can connect your Everest forms with PayPal to easily collect payments, donations, and online orders.

products.title: Stripe
products.name: Everest Forms Stripe
products.excerpt: Allows you to integrate online payment service to your e-commerce website. You can connect your Everest forms with Stripe to easily collect payments, donations, and online orders.

products.title: Geolocation
products.name: Everest Forms Geolocation
products.excerpt: Allows you to collect precise location of your visitors and store their geolocation data like IP, Country, and Postal/Zip Code along with form submissions.

products.title: Multi Part Forms
products.name: Everest Forms Multi Part
products.excerpt: Allows you to easily break your long forms into multiple parts. It helps you to make a stepwise form instead of a long-form which adds rich user experience to your website.

products.title: Custom Captcha
products.name: Everest Forms Custom Captcha
products.excerpt: Allows you to add custom questions or math captcha to your form and fight back against spam form submissions. It also adds a security layer to your website.

products.title: Survey Polls and Quiz
products.name: Everest Forms Survey, Polls and Quiz
products.excerpt: Allows you to create intuitive survey, poll and quiz forms easily. Provides additional fields like Rating, Likert Scale, Scale Rating as well as admin reporting graphs, charts and much more.

products.title: User Registration
products.name: Everest Forms User Registration
products.excerpt: Allows you to create a custom WordPress user registration form instantly in few simple steps. You can add or remove input fields as per the style of your registration using this feature.

products.title: Post Submissions
products.name: Everest Forms Post Submissions
products.excerpt: Allows you to have user-submitted content. It also lets your users to submit their blogs posts from front-end without the hassle of logging into the admin dashboard.

products.title: Zapier
products.name: Everest Forms Zapier
products.excerpt: Allows you to easily connect your forms with over 1500+ popular web applications without any hassle. It makes integrating forms and apps buttery-smooth.
